name: The International Conference on Information Technology and Digital Applications
content: Papers on original works are solicited on a variety of topics including, but not limited to, the following tracks and topics: A. Applications: 1\. Digital Forensics and Security, 2\. Educational Technology, 3\. Internet of Things, 4\. Medical Informatics, 5\. Multimedia; B. Hard Science and Engineering: 1\. Computer Networks and Wireless Communication, 2\. Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition, 3\. Intelligent System/Artificial Intelligence; C. Software Engineering: 1\. Data Mining and Analysis, 2\. Databases and Information Systems, 3\. Human Computer Interaction, 4\. Information Theory, 5\. Software Systems. All accepted papers of ICITDA 2016 will be published in the printed and online proceeding. The online proceeding is a part of conference series of IOP Publication, which will be indexed by Scopus, EI-Compendex, and Inspec. Please read the author instructions before submit a paper. Each paper should not be more than 6 pages.
organizers: Department of Informatics, Universitas Islam Indonesia, Yogyakarta, Indonesia
